Description:
MODERN DAY LIVING OFFERING LIFESTYLE & LOCATION
Offering the choice of 3, brand new master built townhouses with prices starting from $300,000, these properties present a wonderful opportunity for the downsizer, investor, first home owner or young professional alike. All of these beautiful townhouses are low maintenance with minimal upkeep and completed landscaping included. The high quality, immaculately presented homes offer warm subtle d√©cor throughout including a modern functional kitchen show-casing quality appliances, spacious open plan living, 2 good sized bedrooms with built in robes and a modern 3 piece bathroom completing the practical floor plan. Located in a quiet court setting within walking distance to St Theresa's Church whilst offering easy access to the Bendigo CBD including shopping, vibrant cafe's and the train station these properties present a wonderful lifestyle opportunity!
Please note: ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A PHONE NUMBER

Description:
Residential Development Opportunity
When developing property, location is paramount - and what an opportunity that is available here. Offering approx. 1900sqm of General Residential Zoned land, situated right in the heart of Kennington, with the Latrobe University within a stones throw, the newly established Kennington Village just a short stroll, not to mention Kennington Reservoir, Primary Schools and local eateries all within walking distance - the positioning here is nothing short of perfect.
Land allotments in superior locations as sizeable as this, do not come around all that often. Put this one into your diary, 11am Saturday 12th December.

Description:
Easy to live in, Easy to let out
Situated at the end of a quiet street, this well maintained two bedroom home offers an affordable entry into a great location. The home offers large open plan living with spacious dining and living areas adjoining a well appointed kitchen. A large pantry, wall oven and hot plates combine with ample cupboard space to provide a functional and appealing kitchen. Storage is taken care of with large built in robes with shelving in both bedrooms and separate linen cupboard. All seasons are well catered for with ducted reverse cycle heating and cooling. The tiled bathroom is a good size, separate shower and vanity. A small garage with roller door can also double as an extra living area as it is lined and carpeted for dual usage. Outside boasts a private landscaped courtyard with glimpses of St Aidens over the back fence and a small securely fenced yard. Close to schools, public transport and shopping centers. This property represents great value for both owner-occupiers and investors.
Insights: 8 Kate Close, Kennington VIC 3550 was last sold in 2016 and 17 other 2 bedroom house in Kennington have recently been sold.

Description:
IDEAL INVESTMENT OR OWNER/OCCUPIER IN SOUGHT AFTER LOCATION
On offer is a conveniently located roomy 2 bedroom unit which has been well maintained and is situated within walking distance to facilities such as Strath Village, the new Kennington Village shopping centre, Latrobe University and public transport. Currently rented to an excellent tenant with vacant possession available the unit comprises a large living/dining area offering gas heating and wall mounted air conditioner, a light filled kitchen with gas stove and more than ample storage space and 2 good sized bedrooms with built in robes. The property also includes a bright bathroom and a separate laundry leading out to a facing fully enclosed courtyard and garden area with a single lockup garage. This well upheld brick unit is ideal for a retiree, young couple or the astute investor alike, call today to book your inspection.
Please note: ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A PHONE NUMBER

Description:
SPACIOUS 3 BEDROOM TOWNHOUSE
Ideally positioned this spacious town house offers all the benefits of low maintenance living. Set in a well maintained development the home offers, 3 bedrooms, the main with ensuite and WIR, separate lounge, fully fitted kitchen opening onto the tiled dining area which overlooks the rear yard, a three piece bathroom and separate laundry & toilet. The outside features a double lock up garage with auto doors, established gardens, and the potential to add further shedding or van accommodation in the yard. Live in or invest the choice is yours.

Description:
EXCITING PROPERTY WITH BOUNDLESS OPPORTUNITIES
Capturing beautiful breezes with light filled interiors, this solid double storey home sits atop a fantastic elevated block. Just awaiting your own sense of style & flair, here's a perfect opportunity to further enhance & create that ideal dream home when time & budget allow. The grand entry is bathed in sunlight & features a striking wrought iron & timber staircase. Comprising spacious formal lounge with wood heater, slate feature panelling & French doors leading out to the stone paved porch/terrace. This would be a glorious spot to sit with your morning coffee & contemplate the day ahead, or relax, drink in hand at the end of the day & enjoy the sunset. Kitchen/meals with servery through to separate dining, 3 bedrooms with the option to convert the dining space into a 4th, plus there's ample room upstairs for even further bedrooms if extra space is what you're looking for. 2 of the bedrooms contain built-in robes & each has a sunny view of the outdoors. The upstairs consists of an enormous rumpus room with vaulted ceiling, warm sitting area featuring sunlit window seat with storage & treetop views. Extra comforts include 3 piece family bathroom, timber flooring, split system air conditioner, built-in shelving & cabinetry throughout & external laundry. With large shed at the rear, the rest of the outside is a blank canvas allowing you to be as creative as you wish. In an unbeatable location on a lovely wide street close to shops, schools & transport. Why not choose to re-create & restore to its original grandeur.
Insights: 10 Steane Street, Kennington VIC 3550 was last sold in 2015 and 26 other 4 bedroom house in Kennington have recently been sold.

Description:
INVEST OR NEST!!
Situated in a quiet court close to La Trobe university, Strath Hill & Strath Village shopping centers & schools, this comfortable home would make a good investment or first home. All bedrooms have built-in-robes, the open plan kitchen/meals/living area is generous and the 588m2 block is very manageable. There's a dishwasher, pantry, ducted heating and air-conditioning and internal access from the double garage with remote control. It's currently leased to excellent tenants for $300 per week, but vacant possession would be available from early January.

Description:
Optimum Location
In a prime location in the heart of Kennington only minutes to all amenities, the Kennington Reservoir, Kennington Village shopping centre, schools and transportation is this superb allotment. Set on approximately 1050 sqm and ready to build on you won't find a better location than this central address.
This allotment offers diversity as you have the opportunity to build your dream family home or subdivide (STCA).
This block is situated at the end of a quiet, private street, ideal for the growing family. With great access and quality established home's surrounding, this allotment is definitely an opportunity not to be missed! All services are available.
Kennington Primary, St Theresa's and BSE Secondary College are all walking distance. Medical centres and bus stops are very close by allowing you to carry out your day to day life with ease! There are also fantastic sporting facilities, walking tracks and shopping centres within close proximity, plus all that the Bendigo CBD has to offer only 5 minutes away.
Contact the agent today for more information!

Description:
Charming Home In Desirable Location
Located just 5 minutes from the centre of Bendigo, and walking distance to a chemist, primary school and sporting facilities, is this charming weatherboard home. Features include 2 bedrooms with the option of converting the built in sunroom to a massive 3rd bedroom. The lounge has a gas heater & ornate cornices. The kitchen has an electric stove, ample bench space plus frosted glass doors that open to the dining area. Both bedrooms have BIRs and built in dressers, and share the 3 piece bathroom. The sunroom is light, bright and large enough to become the 3rd bedroom or entertaining area. There's a split system in one of the bedrooms plus ceiling fans throughout. Automatic shutters are on the windows. Outside is a shed, neat gardens and side access.
Luke Goggin Real Estate - We Get Results 5442 1422

Description:
CREAM BRICK HOME IN POPULAR AREA
On offer is this affordable home or investment property in popular Kennington that has been with the present owner for 28 years. The well-presented home is blessed with three bedrooms (all with BIR's) and two separate living areas.
The kitchen is functional with gas cooking and a servery to the family room. Gas heating in both living areas and a split system for all year comfort. Great storage and a large laundry.
Set on a (754sqm approx.) elevated allotment with a fantastic backyard including: entertaining area and built-in BBQ, shedding and workshop (with c/c and power).
This home will suit: first home buyers, families, investment or couples. Inspection is a definite must.

Description:
10 out of 10 FOR PRESENTATION
This is an ideal opportunity to purchase a family home for a great price in Kennington. Set on approx. 677sqm is a four bedroom home (all with BIR's) - just move in!
All bedrooms have a split system for all year comfort. The lounge (also with split system) is spacious with plenty of natural light. The kitchen & meals area has been updated and includes: electric cooking, dishwasher, pantry and good storage.
Head out to the backyard and you will never want to go back inside. Fernery, paved entertaining areas and built in BBQ for family enjoyment. Manicured gardens finish off the private backyard. A handy workshop at the rear of the garage is great for extra storage or home handyman.
This home is close to everything: schools, public transport, CBD.

Description:
THIS IS AN ABSOLUTE CHARMER !
Offering a wonderful blend of comfortable and convenient inner city living in the form of a well-kept 50's weatherboard, in great condition within walking distance to supermarkets, post office, bus stop, public pool, great schools and only a few minutes' drive from the centre of Bendigo. Apart from the attractive position & facade, what lies within these walls will exceed your expectations. The wide hallway with chandelier, polished floor boards, storage and modern kitchen. Offering three large bedrooms each with lots of natural light, built in robes and ceiling fans. The well-appointed kitchen is modern & very functional, with access to the formal meals, and large lounge. The land size is neat, with single car garage, low maintenance garden with a high yielding lemon tree and paved courtyard. As a first home buyer, investor or even downsizer, this is a delightful package which you must inspect.

Description:
PERFECTLY POSITIONED, LOW MAINTENANCE LIVING
Perfectly positioned in sought after Strathdale in a quiet court location, this beautifully presented home provides a great opportunity for downsizers, investors or first homeowners alike. Freshly painted inside and out whilst boasting stunning new carpets and curtains, the home comprises 3 bedrooms; the master with an ensuite and walk in robe, a separate study, a practical kitchen brimming with ‚Äòas new‚Äô appliances and a good sized pantry, 2 versatile living areas including a spacious family room and a formal lounge room plus a family bathroom and laundry with handy storage. The home also offers the convenience of gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling, secure internal access from the double remote garage and an attractive low maintenance backyard with a lovely paved courtyard. Offering safe and secure living whilst ideally set in a fantastic location offering easy access to the lake, Bendigo Regional Park and the Kennington and Strath Village supermarkets, an inspection is a must!
Please note: ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A PHONE NUMBER

Description:
Perfectly positioned and presented
A short walk to Strath/Kennington Villages and local schools in a quiet street in highly sought after Kennington is this perfectly positioned '50s weatherboard home. The original character has been tastefully retained but perfectly blended with contemporary styling. This home truly has to be seen to be fully appreciated.
In the large living-room north facing wall-to-wall / floor-to-ceiling picture windows overlook the lush, private front garden - a real point of difference. A gas log fire and reverse cycle A/C keep the open plan living/dining/kitchen areas comfortable. The very appealing and spacious kitchen has a large island bench, 12 pot-drawers, double pantry, electric wall oven, gas hot plates, dishwasher and opens onto the private decked area.
There is a central fully modernised 3 piece bathroom and separate toilet and the over-sized laundry allows space for easy conversion to an en-suite bathroom if required.
Three very large bedrooms with built in robes and ceiling fans and one with split system A/C.
Current owner (only the 2nd) has lived here for 26 years, so everything needed to make this house a wonderful liveable home is done - external blinds, quality drapes/window coverings, modernised and well maintained and the out-side painted 4 years ago. Beautiful established low maintenance gardens surround the home and shade trees include Japanese Maples, Crab Apples and an Oak.
Enjoy the large, private elevated decking area - perfect for entertaining or relaxing under the shade of an oak tree.
Other features include 9'6" ceilings, new gas HWS, 2 water tanks, extensive under-house storage (or man cave??), excellent fencing, raised vegetable garden, extensive paving and weatherboard garden shed. A single carport with room for another car.
Insights: 10 Kara Street, Kennington VIC 3550 was last sold in 2015 and 74 other 3 bedroom house in Kennington have recently been sold.

Description:
Great Value in an Exceptional Location
Situated in a highly sought-after location, within walking distance to La Trobe University and Kennington/Strath Village, is this tidy brick veneer residence.
Set on a spacious 749m2 (approx) allotment, the home comprises of 3 bedrooms, the main bedroom with a walk-through robe to the dual-access bathroom, and built-in robes in the other 2.
There is an open-plan kitchen/meals and family room plus a spacious separate lounge room which also adjoins a formal dining space.
Modern conveniences include split-system reverse-cycle air-conditioning and gas heating.
External attributes include an extensive paved rear pergola, perfect for entertaining during the warmer months ahead and accessible from the family area through a glass slider.
There is also a double garage, garden shed and a landscaped garden setting.
Just a leisurely walk to Kennington Reservoir and walking tracks.
A very affordable property which would make an excellent addition to any investment portfolio with an expected rental return of around $350 - $370 per week, but also a great place to live for owner occupiers.
Michael Kerr : 0418 508 541

Description:
Renovate or start from scratch
This property is set on a 694m2 block and is situated only 2km's from Bendigo's CBD and very close to sporting grounds, schools, pubs and shopping centers.
The options are for you to renovate the existing house or to start from scratch and build a new home or 2/3 townhouses.

Description:
Great 1st Home or Investment Opportunity
Set in Popular Kennington, this affordable 3 bedroom home with 2 living areas is well worth inspection.
Boasting a generous kitchen/meals area, spacious lounge and plenty of space in all the bedrooms. The property also offers a level block, workshop and a very generous frontage to Sternberg Street of approx 25.5m, making it an ideal townhouse site or development site (STCA).
Ideal for the 1st home buyer or renovator wanting a great start to their real-estate portfolio, or an investor wanting a central position at an affordable price to hold and develop at a later date (STCA). Great location within walking distance to Central Bendigo, St. Teresa's Primary School, Kennington Oval, with public transport close by.
Damien O'Shannessy : 0417 055 593

Description:
PERFECT POSITION - IMPRESSIVE SPACE
Combine all these ingredients: elevation, family friendly dimensions amidst established tiered gardens on a generous 960m2 allotment
and only a stone's throw to Kennington Reservoir . Fabulous flexibility is on offer in this three bedroom plus study, brick veneer home built in the late 1980's. Amazing light spacious formal lounge and dining room. Very large master bedroom with terrific walk in robe and ensuite.
Generous open plan kitchen/meals/living area with feature gas log fire. The well designed kitchen consists of gas hot plates & electric oven, Bosch dishwasher, walk in pantry and offers excellent storage. Extras include ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling. Relax beneath the covered decked pergola area which overlooks the private treed rear garden. An immediately comfortable family home which requires a lift &/or makeover! Double garage, underhouse storage area. Small workshop (conc only). Minutes into Bendigo's CBD & close to all of Strathdale's conveniences including shopping precincts, great schools & Latrobe University.
Di Long : 0417 343 380
